org.smartregister.domain.jsonmapping

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.smartregister.domain.db.BaseDataObject
      • org.smartregister.domain.db.BaseEntity
        • org.smartregister.domain.jsonmapping.User

  • public class User
extends BaseEntity
    The person who actually entered or modified data into system. The User before getting access to any service in system have to be authenticated by system. A user may also be linked with a provider by BaseEntity
